SELECT l.id AS lectureId, l.title, t.name AS teacher, l.price, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM enrollment e WHERE e.lecture_id = l.id) AS studentCount, l.category, l.created_date_time AS createdAt FROM lecture l JOIN teacher t ON l.teacher_id = t.id
and l.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
order by created_date_time DESC
